𓏞 𓏟 𓎘 script scratch

𓏞 𓏟

𒊬𒌑 sarú™ inscribe 𒅆𒋛𒀀 ši-ṭir •šcriṭir inscribed 𒊭𒋫𒊒 šaʳ-ṭa-ru scriter "write"

𒊮 šagʳ in 𒊮𒋧 ≈ 𓊃 𓐍 𓂋 𓅱 𓏛 scrit 𒋧 sig₁₀ secret 𒋧 šūmū scheme #şummuru σχῆμα schédio σχέδιο "plan, plot"

scrit scribe script

𓊃 𓈙 𓏞 𓏝 | write, inscribe | ⲥϧⲁⲓ sxai{b/t} scribe scrit schreib ⇔ script
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 | roll (of papyrus) | scrit scrolt
𓍼 𓈙 𓂝 𓏏 | scroll | scrit script (𓂝 crp) Schriftrolle 𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇 | papyrus plant|χειρit™ > scrit Schrift script ⇔ write 𓏟
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇 | papyrus plant|cherīd™ drīt > reed 𓇅 𓏞
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇 | papyrus plant| ≠ deed (sic) dates dict dice

𒍣𒄫 zi-kir decree

𒆳 šat ≈ scrit in 𒆳 mat ≈ mot 𓌃 in 𒀀𒆳 amat a word 𒋛𒆳 simᵇat symbol™

𒋗𒊌𒆠𒀉 šukkit; šu-uk-kiʳit •scrit "word" Schrift

prescript

Scrit as Vorschrift (prescription,precept) in its widest senses:
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 | roll (of papyrus) | scrit > σχέδη skhédē “papyrus strip / leaf” χ
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓀁 | plan, counsel, determination, governance, conduct, condition, fortune, affair, fashion, nature, custom |
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏜 | plan, counsel, determination, governance, conduct, condition, fortune, affair, fashion, nature, custom |
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓅱 𓇋 𓇋 𓀀 𓏪 | those who govern | secure …KURIO sceer > steer !
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏛 𓀀 | captain (of ship) | sceer > steer Steuermann
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏛 𓀀 | captain (of ship) | skhrvein > سروان sarvân > סֶרֶן séren +++ << 𐤈𐤓𐤍 tyrant ƒ
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏜 𓄡 𓏏 𓏤 | thought | thghr⋍thinker ←?? / ⇔gnost?

𓊃 𓐍 𓂋 𓅱 𓏛 | plan | σχῆμα secret scheme scrit ⇔ causative of

𓎡 𓄿 𓏏 𓀁 | plan | σχέδιο schédio schedule schedula σχέδη skhédē “papyrus strip / leaf” ☑
𓎡 𓄿 𓏏 𓀁 | plan, thought, device, plot | Karte, chart, card! ☑ ⇔ s'crit Kraft ?
𓎡 𓄿 𓏏 𓀁 | thought | चित्त citta PIE *kʷeyt- “to notice” gedachte

parallel influenced form prescript ⇔ precept პრინციპი ṗrinciṗi ⇔ carpe ⇔ carve

sūrah scripture

Sanskrit संस्कृत sáṃskṛta- sáṃ:sym zusammen kṛta 𓂓 (sic)

𒄭𒊒 ḫe-ru carve
𒄭𒊒 to dig
⇔
𒄭𒊑𒌅 ḫi-ri-tu
𒄭𒊑𒌅 an ornament, channel, ditch

secret deceit ⇔ Dekret

𓎼 𓂋 𓍅 𓀁 | falsehood, lie | see 𓍅
𓌨 𓂋 𓏏 𓂝 𓅪 𓏥 | deceit | ध्रुति dhruti द्रुह्यति druhyati, “to deceive” 𓌨 gr > dgr > dhr > dr
𓌨 𓂋 𓏏 𓂝 𓏛 𓏥 | writing materials | kreiden ( Lüge ⇔ logo ) ⇔ Dekret decree
𓌨 𓂋 𓏏 𓂝 𓏛 𓏥 | writing materials | scrit < script graphit
𓌨 𓂋 𓏏 𓏛 𓏥 | possessions, belongings, share, portion, requirements, duty, skill | Geräte > Güter goods

𓆓 𓎛 𓅱 𓏏 𓏮 𓀭 | Thoth | •Scrwty God of script , wisdom …

𒈬𒊬𒌑 𒅆𒋛𒀀 𒈬𒅀
MU.SAR-ú ši-ṭir MU-ia
im-scrúve šcriṭir namu'ia an inscribed object bearing my name 𓇑

𒈬𒊬𒂊 𒅆𒋛𒀀 𒈬𒋙
MU.SAR-e ši-ṭir MU-šú em-scarve scritir nomu-šú. an inscribed object bearing his name

𒈬𒃻𒊑𒂊 𒀭𒉌𒂊 𒆳𒊒 mu-šá-re-e an-né-e šaṭ-ru em.screive année šaṭru recorded on this inscribed object
